description.title: Jazz it Up
description.description: Jazz up your lounge room with the fabulous Jazz 3 seater sofa, featuring an ultra trendy design with streamlined arms, timber legs and plump seats. Stitched and pulled-in back cushions give this sofa a designer flair.

description.title: Design It Your Way
description.description: It’s so easy to create a sofa you love at an affordable price with Design It Your Way! With more than 50 fabrics to choose from, there’s a sofa for every style and every home. All Design It Your Way sofas are backed by our quality guarantee to ensure peace of mind when you make your purchase.

description.title: Better Bedtimes
description.description: It doesn't get any easier than this. Give your child's bedroom a whole new look with this great Gecko bed. Available in blue, pink, white, or black, the decorating options are endless. There's also plenty of space underneath for storage or a trundle. Built from strong tubular steel, the frame is strong and durable, with powder coating for superior chip resistance. Suitable for children 5 years and over. Mattress not included.

description.title: Adaptable Style
description.description: Fairies, trains, flowers, sports, or pop stars - the versatile design of the Gecko will easily accommodate your child's changing tastes.

description.title: Space Aplenty
description.description: This bed is designed with enough room underneath for a spare mattress, a trundle bed (available separately), or storage boxes.

description.title: A Pearl Among Oysters
description.description: Give your mini-me the chance to live out their underwater fantasy with this shell-inspired Venus Bed. The pop of pink is sure to captivate little imaginations and welcome them into the land of nod where they can dream of mermaids.

description.title: Sturdy Build
description.description: The single-size bed (104cm x 109cm x 196.5cm) comes with plush polyester velvet fabric, a Finnish pine and plywood frame, rubberwood legs with clear lacquer, and poplar flat slats. Mattress not included.

description.title: Sleek Design with Storage
description.description: Upgrade your bedroom with the sleek and functional Como Single Bed. Featuring a modern design with storage options, this bed is perfect for those looking to maximize space in style.

full_details.Assembled Size: L (dimensions) cm x D (dimensions) cm x H (dimensions) cm

description.title: Summer Dining
description.description: Looking to spruce up your outdoor living space with a new on-trend design? The Rhodes Outdoor Carver Dining Chair is exactly what you’ve been searching for. The seat has been crafted from moulded polypropylene and matched back with metal legs, resulting in a sturdy construction. The color has been UV stabilized to prevent fading when exposed to the sun, and galvanized hardware and legs to prevent rusting and corrosion. The Rhodes Outdoor Carver Dining Chair is lightweight and incredibly multipurpose. Perfect for indoor and outdoor dining or can be moved around the pool or garden on those long summer days. Grab yours before summer's over!

description.title: Whimsical Willow
description.description: The Willow Bunk Bed, a timeless contemporary design that will be the silent hero of any bedroom. The open curved frame of the Willow bed gives an airy feeling and allows your bed linen to take center stage. The frame is strong and powder-coated for superior chip resistance, and the plywood slats are durable and ready to support you for years to come.

description.title: Orange Tick AFRDI Certified
description.description: This is an Orange Tick AFRDI Certified Bunk that complies with Australian Safety Standards. View certificate [here](certificate_link).

description.title: Adaptable Design
description.description: The Willow Bunk Bed has been designed to grow with your children's needs (and yours) in mind. When the time comes that Bunk Beds are no longer required, you'll be able to dismantle and rearrange the beds into 2 x Single Beds.

description.title: Mattress Recommendations
description.description: Click [here](mattress_link) to view the Sleeptight Single Mattress, our recommendation for all top-level bunk beds.

description.title: Who Said You Had To Choose Between Form And Function?
description.description: Who said you had to choose between form and function? Your new cabinet will balance perfectly with your existing decor.

description.title: Product Features
description.description:
Durable MDF tabletop
Fabric drawers
Strong rustproof steel frame
Spacious removable drawer
Non-woven rigid fabric
Pull handles
Smooth runner
Adjustable feet protect floor from scratches

This product is not on display or sold in stores. This product is only available for delivery.

description.title: Poster Bed
description.description: Featuring a delicately welded metal design, the charming Giselle Single Bed features a chic poster design. Its versatile design provides plenty of styling options and makes this a great multipurpose bed for a kid’s bedroom, spare room, or family room.

description.title: Versatile Style
description.description: The powder-coated crisp white finish gives a blank canvas on which to showcase your favorite fabric styles.

description.title: Flexible and Compact Design
description.description: The Cosmic Twin Bunk is a flexible and compact design that allows you to pick from a traditional stacked bunk design or have them separated into 2 single beds. Crafted from metal with a premium powder-coated finish, resulting in a sturdy and durable product.

description.title: Product Features
description.description:
Crafted from Metal
Premium Powder Coat Finish
Flexible & Compact Design
Converts from Bunk Bed to 2 x Single Beds
Extra Caps provided for Headboard & Headrest
AFRDI Orange Tick Certification
Ample Headspace when stacked as a Bunk Bed
Light Grey Colour
Furniture that grows with your family

description.title: Orange Tick AFRDI Certified
description.description: This is an Orange Tick AFRDI Certified Bunk that complies with Australian Safety Standards. View certificate [here](certificate_link).

description.title: Mattress Recommendations
description.description: Click [here](mattress_link) to view the Sleeptight Single Mattress, our recommendation for all top-level bunk beds.

description.title: Bohemian Living
description.description: Store your clothing and more in your very own Java Dresser! Forget the floor-drobe or that random chair in the corner, with the Java’s spacious drawers, you’ll keep clutter at bay and make getting ready a breeze.

description.title: Get the Look
description.description: Fancy the coastal and bohemian look in your home but not the price tag? Get ready for the latest and greatest range – the Java! Our trendy Java range features natural rattan doors, panels, and drawers with a textured, sandy oak look finish! Complete the look and add the wow factor to your home by pairing your new dresser with other items from the Java range.

description.title: Secure Me
description.description: At Fantastic Furniture safety is one of our biggest priorities. On the Secure Me Tab, learn more about toppling, and why securing your product with wall straps is so important.

description.title: Cozy Coastal Experience
description.description: The Avalon range brings a sophisticated coastal twist to your child’s bedroom. With fluted ribbed detailing and a brushed silver metal frame, this sturdy and strong construction is the perfect foundation to let your child’s personality shine.

description.title: Features
description.description:
Premium Whitewash
Fluted Rib Detailing
Sophisticated Design
Sturdy Construction
Easy Assembly
Ideal for Children
Grows with Family

description.title: Secure Me
description.description: At Fantastic Furniture safety is one of our biggest priorities. On the Secure Me Tab, learn more about toppling, and why securing your product with wall straps is so important.

description.title: Snuggle into Comfort
description.description: This gorgeous Tivoli Armchair combines both a sleek look and undeniable comfort in a warm sand-colored fabric. Thick foam seats and back cushions with smart stitching give an eye-catching contemporary style that will look fantastic in any home.

description.title: Features
description.description:
Four Colour Options
Quilted Seat Detail
Angled Back Cushions
Easy Assembly

description.title: Spacious Storage Solution
description.description: The Kobi Large Wide Bookcase offers a spacious and stylish storage solution for your books and display items. With glass doors and a natural wood finish, it adds a touch of elegance to any room.

description.title: Features
description.description:
Four Shelves
Glass Doors
Sturdy Construction
Easy Assembly

description.title: Natural Oak
description.description: The Kobi Large Wide Bookcase with Panelled Doors is the perfect addition to stand by other pieces in your home. Oak effect furniture combined with white walls, greenery, and different placements makes a home feel bright and sunny. It looks good standing on its own and partners beautifully with other shelving furniture against a wall. Use the six wide shelves to store books, awards, fine China, ornaments, and pot plants.

description.title: Features
description.description:
Six wide shelf bookcase with panelled doors.
Protect possessions with two oak effect panelled doors.
With the flexibility of adjustable shelves, make them whatever size you like.

description.description:

Colour: Oak
Height: 201cm
Length: 80cm
Depth: 28cm

This product is not on display or sold in stores. This product is only available for delivery.

description.title: Glam Dining
description.description: The Windsor Dining Chair will add a touch of classic glam to your dining room. Feast your eyes on its trendy upholstery with tufted button detailing, sure to be a family favourite. With a padded seat and back, you’ll be enjoying family dinners in superior comfort. Style the Windsor Dining Chair as a carver accent chair with the Dalkeith 6 or 8 Seater Dining Table for the ultimate luxe dining space.

description.title: More Than Just A Good-Looking Chair
description.description: Enjoy the Windsor Dining Chair first for its classic good look, then for its sturdy construction. Built with you and your family in mind, the Windsor features dark legs made from solid rubber wood.

description.title: Sleeper Storage Solution
description.description: The Jordan Collection is the storage solution every parent needs for their little one's bedroom. Its classic design gives you plenty of space to neatly tuck away their books and toys.

description.title: Included in this package
description.description:
Jordan Bunk Bed
Jordan Underbed Storage Drawer

description.title: Jordan Storage Drawer
description.description: The Jordan Underbed Storage Drawer is the extra storage solution your kid needs! With 4 compartments to keep things tidy, it has plenty of space to store blankets, toys, and more. Castor wheels make it easy to slide in and out from under the Jordan Beds and Bunks.

description.title: Jordan Bunk Bed
description.description: Great for kids’ rooms and guest bedrooms, this stylish bunk bed comfortably sleeps one underneath and one on top. As your family grows or your needs change, then separate the bunks. Mattress not included.

description.title: Introducing our Arlo Twin Bunk
description.description: The Arlo Twin Bunk is the first fabric bunk in our range! Exclusively designed by our in-house Buyer and Product Engineer, this bunk is crafted with Australian families in mind. Featuring a stylish light oak solid timber guard rail frame and ladder, the Arlo Bunk is a great alternative for parents who want a soft and cozy option for their kids. The premium timber construction and foam cushioning ensure that the bunk is sturdy and comfortable, making it a great option for kids and teens alike.

description.title: Safety First
description.description: This is an Orange Tick AFRDI Certified Bunk that complies with Australian Safety Standards. Available in two colors - grey and blush - the Arlo Bunk is upholstered in a durable polyester fabric that will stand up to years of wear and tear. The bunk is quick and easy to assemble, making it a hassle-free addition to any bedroom.

description.title: Secure Me
description.description: At Fantastic Furniture, safety is one of our biggest priorities. Learn more about toppling and why securing your product with wall straps is so important.

description.title: Mattress Recommendations
description.description: Click here to view the Sleeptight Single Mattress, our recommendation for all top-level bunk beds.

description.title: Hideaway Cabin
description.description: Kids and parents alike will love this cleverly designed compact bunk bed, lowboy, and bedside. The low rise design and deep sides on the top bunk make this the perfect first bunk bed, providing comfort and safety. The built-in reversible ladder is a great space saver, and a light ash finish gives a smart contemporary look to suit both boys and girls. (Mattress & accessories not included)

description.title: Luxurious and Contemporary Design
description.description: The Sleepapedic range features a soft, luxurious fabric euro-top, with sophisticated quilting and multiple comfort layers for the ultimate support and comfort of a plush feel mattress. Rest easy knowing that the Sleepapedic Mattress range comes with a 10-year warranty.

description.title: Multiple Comfort Layers
description.description: The Sleepapedic Mattress range is designed so that each feel features a different assortment of comfort layers so you can pick the perfect mattress feel for you. In addition, the gel-infused memory foam layer keeps you cool and comfortable, offering both molded support and heat-dissipation properties. The gel memory foam comfort layer provides pressure relief as it cradles the body, which eliminates the feeling of stiffness and helps to reduce muscle and joint pains. (Base is sold separately)

description.title: Spring System Designed for Comfort
description.description: The Sleepapedic Mattress has a 5-zone pocket spring system to provide you greater support where you need it! The 5-zone spring system is designed to provide the greatest support at the widest parts of the body; the shoulder and hips. This spring system encourages a straighter spine when lying down, which is the best position for a good night’s rest. The mattress also contours to your body shape for maximum comfort and reduces partner disturbance for a great, uninterrupted night’s sleep.

description.title: This product is not on display or sold in stores.
description.description: This product is only available for delivery.

description.title: Features
description.description:
40 cm total height - 23 cm thick metal frame is super sturdy
Quick snap system assembles in minutes
100% polyester cover
Smartly shipped in 1 carton provides easy delivery right to your door
Quick assembly
All tools required in packaging

description.title: Sleep In Comfort
description.description: Sleep in comfort and awake refreshed with the Spine-Lab 5-Zone Bonnell Spring Mattress. The 5-zone design of the mattress provides both pressure-relief and support. The mattress has been designed using traditional bonnell-spring construction finished with several layers of high-density foam. The cool-touch quilted cover and the breathable upper memory foam layer ensure that heat does not get trapped for the maximum in comfort. The upper foam layers have been designed to adjust to the body and provide a customised and relaxing sleep surface, while the lower bonnell spring layer has been designed to offer long-lasting support.

description.title: Features
description.description:
Medium-firm design
Hypo-allergenic material
Sturdy inner bonnell-spring design
5-zone design provides both support and pressure redistribution
The upper foam layers adjust to the body to provide a customised and relaxing sleep surface
The lower bonnell spring layer offers lasting support
High-density foam
Cool-touch quilted cover

description.title: This product is not on display or sold in stores.
description.description: This product is only available for delivery.

description.title: Sleepover Solution
description.description: Available in crisp white, the Jordan Trundle is the space-saving sleepover solution you need! Castor wheels make the Jordan Trundle easy to slide in and out from under the Jordan Beds and Bunks. Simply pull it out when your little one's friends come to stay and tuck back under when not in use!

description.title: Get the Look
description.description: Pair your new Jordan Trundle Bed with the rest of the Jordan range for a coordinated look with the Jordan Bed, Bedside Table, Tallboy, and more!

description.title: Mattress Recommendations
description.description: Click [here](mattress_link) to view the Sleeptight Single Mattress, our recommendation for all top-level bunk beds.

description.title: Supportive
description.description: The Sleepscape is perfect for every-body! A medium-firm feel, the pocket springs of this mattress provide you with support exactly where you need it. With a eurotop design, you’ll be enjoying edge to edge comfort without fear of rolling off.

description.title: Comfortable
description.description: Upholstered in a quality, soft-feeling jacquard fabric, the Sleepscape is comfortable and suitable for most types of sleeper.

description.title: Mattress in a Box
description.description: The Sleepscape Mattress is compressed, rolled and boxed to fit in your car for easy transportation. Take the Sleepscape Mattress home today, unroll it and allow it to decompress for 48 hours to enjoy the blissful night’s sleep you’ve been dreaming of.

description.title: Mattress in a Box
description.description: Getting a great night's sleep has never been quicker or easier than with this comfortable take-home mattress. It comes rolled and compressed so you can pack it in your car and take it home the same day. Just open it up and the Sleeptight mattress is ready to sleep on within 48 hours of opening.

description.title: Supportive Comfort
description.description: Featuring world-renowned Bonnell springs, this mattress will support you while you sleep. A thick foam layer provides additional comfort to enhance deep sleep.

description.title: Havana 6 Seater Dining Table
description.description: The Havana 6 Seater Dining Table adds a cool coastal feel to your home. Featuring an oak look finish that works well with a variety of colorways, you can easily style this dining table with bright pops of color or neutral dining chairs.

description.title: Province Dining Chair
description.description: Timeless and elegant, add a touch of French café style to your dining room with the Province Dining Chair. The Province offers a fresh and fun take on the popular home décor look with its curved seat back and splayed legs. Made from durable powder-coated steel with an easy-clean polypropylene seat.

description.title: French Flair
description.description: Add a French flavour to your dining room with this delightful 6-Seater Dining Table with Newhaven Chairs. Featuring classic French provincial styling with a combination of natural timber top with white legs, your home will receive an instant French makeover.

description.title: 6 Seater Dining Table
description.description: The 6 Seater Dining Table features classic French provincial styling with a combination of natural timber top with white legs, your home will receive an instant French makeover.

description.title: Newhaven Dining Chairs
description.description: The Newhaven Dining Chair is not just a good-looking chair, it’s easy to assemble and easy to clean too! With its durable construction, your next dinner will be fuss-free.

name: 4 Seater Dining Set With Dimi Chairs
6 Seater Dining Set With Samba Chairs

description.title: Stylish and Sophisticated
description.description: The on-trend Samba Dining Chair is the perfect dining companion. With stylish oak-look metal legs and a fabric upholstered seat, you’ll be dining in style and comfort at every meal. The Samba Dining Chair is easy to assemble and has a weight capacity of 120kg.

description.title: Let There Be Light
description.description: Create a refreshingly bright and breezy look in your dining room with the beautiful Havana Dining Set. Featuring the Havana Table and paired with the stylish Mambo Dining Chair, this dining set will give you the latest Scandinavian look for less. Paired with the on-trend Samba chair to give your dining room a funky retro edge.

description.title: Contemporary Design
description.description: Entertain in style with the contemporary looking Havana dining table featuring a light oak textured finish and comfortably seating 6 people.

description.description: The on-trend Samba Dining Chair is the perfect dining companion. With stylish oak-look metal legs and a fabric upholstered seat, you’ll be dining in style and comfort at every meal. The Samba Dining Chair is easy to assemble and has a weight capacity of 120kg.

description.title: Let There Be Light

Featuring the Havana Table and paired with the stylish Mambo Dining Chair, this dining set will give you the latest Scandinavian look for less. Paired with the on-trend Samba chair to give your dining room a funky retro edge.

description.title: Contemporary Design
description.description: Entertain in style with the contemporary looking Havana dining table featuring a light oak textured finish and comfortably seating 6 people.

description.title: Features
description.description: Give your outdoor space a fresh look with this stylish Weston 2.7m Outdoor Umbrella that’s picture-perfect for entertaining friends and family. Designed specifically to endure the extreme Australian weather. Features anodized aluminium frames and sturdy polyester canopies.

description.title: Features
description.description: The comfortable Rocha Lounge Set is perfect for any outdoor area. With its strong powder coated steel frame and HAR-TEX Sling seats this setting will fit seamlessly into any area. 3 Seater Sofa measures: 76cm H x 112cm W x 85cm D Armchairs measure: 76cm H x 60cm W x 85cm D Table measures: 39cm H x 85cm W x 45cm D

description.title: About This Product
description.description: The Whiskey 3 Seater Sofa brings Modest and stylish design to your space. This is an amazing piece with its style, versatility, luxury and value in one. The seat part is well supported by tacked in pocket spring with a pure foam to give you lasting comfort. It is upholstered in an eye-catching brown fabric, and its solid MDF frame construction with Metal legs makes the design simple yet functional.

description.title: Features
description.description: Fashioned with a solid MDF frame for lasting strength and durability. Padded with high-quality foam for superior seating comfort and support. Finished with a practical linen-look Polyester fabric for the perfect blend of resilience and style. Contemporary design and neutral colour palette complements a range of popular interior styles for your convenience. Designed for ease of use and constructed to support the weight of multiple people for your peace of mind. Long armrests to encourage a relaxed posture.
